data.name: Humans Are Useless
data.detailed_description:
An arcade game based on shooting three types of enemies.
The story is about a gang of aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, so they will clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Since is just arcade, the story is not that important but we are planning on use the same characters in our next releases!
You have three hearts in the beginning of every play, and after some kills you can obtain some hearts from the enemies. You have an unlimited amount of time and you have to get the highest score possible before losing all your hearts.
There are nine characters (one of them is locked, so you need to unlock them!) in total, everyone has a different and unique skill that you can use to kill enemies in a easier way!

data.short_description: A gang of nine aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, want to clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Help them in this arcade game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: processore Intel® Core™ i5-11500HE (12 MB di cache, fino a 4,50 GHz)
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD A10-9620P RADEON R5
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

data.legal_notice: This product and the material contained therein (such as text, images, graphics, video, audio, software and any other form of intellectual property) may constitute intellectual property and therefore may be protected by copyright law. The violation of the rights provided therein may therefore result in the application of the criminal or administrative sanctions provided for by art. 171, 171-bis, 171-ter, 174-bis and 174-ter of the law of 22 April 1941, n. 633, in addition to the civil penalties provided for by the Italian civil code.
